name: Not So Alone
description:
FOR MAXIMUM COMFORT : › Download the game on your computer ㅤ › Play with a controller ㅤ
 HOW TO PLAY ? › Two teams face each other in a game of "capture the flag". Your goal is to bring the flag to your base within 8 seconds. ㅤ › You will be switching team every round. ㅤ › Each round a new player joins the enemy team. A 'you' from the past which will replicate anything you did on the previous round.

ㅤ

Credits : AWIP
